description:
From our law office in Bethlehem, Pennsylvania, the attorneys at The Trapani Law Firm represent the rights and entitlements of innocent accident victims and their families who are seeking maximum compensation for the injuries and losses they have suffered as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

Recognized as one of Pennsylvania's leading personal injury practices, our law firm has six offices across the state, providing convenient access to the quality, personalized representation you need for legal challenges involving any of the following:

  • Car, truck and motorcycle accidents
  • Medical malpractice and birth injuries
  • Traumatic brain and spinal cord injuries
  • Mesothelioma
  • Premises liability claims
  • Construction and workplace injuries
  • Defective products
  • Civil rights abuses
  • Wrongful death
  • Other tortious claims

With some of the most dedicated and talented legal minds in the profession, our law firm's attorneys have achieved unprecedented success advocating on behalf of those in need. Throughout our history, we have recovered millions of dollars in settlements and awards for our plaintiff clients, which has earned us lifetime membership in both the Million Dollar and Multi-Million Dollar Advocates forums.

In addition, our attorneys have received many rewards and honors for our professionalism and service, and we promise to do all we can to help increase your chances of obtaining the favorable outcomes you deserve. To find out more about how The Trapani Law Firm can best serve your needs and help you secure a brighter future for yourself and your family, you can contact us by phone or email or through our law firm's website to schedule a free initial consultation.
